大端指令序列
0x00    34080001    0011_0100_0000_1000_0000_0000_0000_0001  ori   $t0, $zero, 0x1   # t0 = 1
0x04    34090001    0011_0100_0000_1001_0000_0000_0000_0001  ori   $t1, $zero, 0x1   # t1 = 1
0x08    34110004    0011 0100 0001 0001 0000 0000 0000 0100    ori   $s1, $zero, 0x4   # s1 = 4
0x0c    340c0100    0011 0100 0000 1100 0000 0001 0000 0000    ori   $t4, $zero, 0x100 # t4 = 0x100
0x10    3c048040    001111_00000001001000000001000000    lui   $a0, 0x8040       # a0 = 0x80400000
0x14    008c6821    000000_00100011000110100000100001    addu  $t5, $a0, $t4     # t5 = 0x80400100
        loop:
0x18    01095021    000000_01000010010101000000100001       addu  $t2, $t0, $t1     # t2 = t0+t1
0x1c    35280000    001101_01001010000000000000000000       ori   $t0, $t1, 0x0     # t0 = t1
0x20    35490000    001101_01010010010000000000000000       ori   $t1, $t2, 0x0     # t1 = t2
0x24    ac890000    101011_00100010010000000000000000       sw    $t1, 0($a0)
0x28    8c8b0000    100011_00100010110000000000000000       lw    $t3, 0($a0)
0x2c    152b0004    000101_01001010110000000000000100       bne   $t1, $t3, end
0x30    34000000    001101_00000000000000000000000000       ori   $zero, $zero, 0   # noop
0x34    00912021    000000_00100100010010000000100001       addu  $a0, $a0, $s1     # a0 += 4
0x38    148dfff7    000101_00100011011111111111110111       bne   $a0, $t5, loop
0x3c    34000000    001101_00000000000000000000000000       ori   $zero, $zero, 0   # noop
end:
0x40    1620ffff    000101_10001000001111111111111111       bne   $s1, $zero, end
0x44    34000000    001101_00000000000000000000000000       ori   $zero, $zero, 0   # noop
